channel.title: Comments on: Impressive Silverlight game engine? Or something else entirely….?

item.title: By: alamiye@163.com
item.dc:creator: alamiye@163.com
item.description: These buttons from left to right are: the number of the enemy and restore life and magic (resurrection), clothing, weapons, magic level, right button magic, sound Right button now only one in the IE browser that can be supported
item.content:encoded:
These buttons from left to right are: the number of the enemy and restore life and magic (resurrection), clothing, weapons, magic level, right button magic, sound
Right button now only one in the IE browser that can be supported
